Package com.sm3.connect4.model

Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sm3.connect4.model.AI
  • public class AI
extends Object
    A class that contains the algorithm for the Computer player in the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AI​(int color, int rows, int columns, int[][] grid, int[] counter, int difficulty)
      Creates an AI with the game's rows, columns, grid, bot color, and counter information.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int BotTurn()
      Uses a score based algorithm to find the best column to place a disc.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AI

        public AI​(int color,
          int rows,
          int columns,
          int[][] grid,
          int[] counter,
          int difficulty)
        Creates an AI with the game's rows, columns, grid, bot color, and counter information.
        Parameters:
        color - An integer that represents the color of the computer player.
        rows - An integer that represents the number of rows in the board.
        columns - An integer that represents the number of columns in the board.
        grid - A double array of integers that represents the game board.
        counter - An array of integers that represents the number of available spaces in each column.
        difficulty - An integer that represents the A.I.'s difficulty.

    • Method Detail

      • BotTurn

        public int BotTurn()
        Uses a score based algorithm to find the best column to place a disc.
        Returns:
        An integer that represents the desired column of the computer player.
